strapiPost.title: Camp Coler
strapiPost.content:
Get your marshmallows, graham crackers, and chocolate because the Coler Campground awaits! 

  • The sites: The Coler Mountain Bike Preserve has 16 campsites with wooden platforms for tents, a picnic table, and a fire pit. All sites are hike in and offered year-round. 
  • In style: Camping at Coler is the best of both worlds: Itâ€™s dry and primitive camping, but a walk away from a heated bathroom with hot showers, and Airship Coffee with hot drinks and yummy food.

Learn more and reserve a campsite HERE.
